snippet: Loved by half the city of Lawrence, Mass., loathed by the other half, Mayor William Lantigua lost a close vote, but the race is not over yet.
abstract: Mayor William Lantigua, who is loved by half the city of Lawrence, Mass, and loathed by the other half, loses re-election in close vote to his challenger, City Councilman Dan Rivera; though Rivera has declared victory and is preparing a transition team, Lantigua has refused to concede and is expected to demand a recount.
lead_paragraph: Loved by half the city of Lawrence, Mass., loathed by the other half, Mayor William Lantigua lost a close vote, but the race is not over yet.

headline.main: Down but Not Out, a Polarizing Mayor Concedes Nothing
headline.print_headline: Down but Not Out, a Polarizing Mayor Concedes Nothing
